TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

summary.span: XPS(XML Paper Specification)의 파트를 XPS 패키지에 추가하기 위한 메서드를 정의합니다.

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 `DocumentStructure` 의 요소는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 패키지, 9 장을 참조 하세요를 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 사양에서 가져올 수 있습니다 [XPS: 사양 및 라이선스 다운로드](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)합니다.For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

span.span: Adds the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
An that represents the part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 `DocumentStructure` 요소의 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] , 패키지의 9 장 참조를 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 사양에서 가져올 수 있습니다 [XPS: 사양 및 라이선스 다운로드](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)합니다.For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
